items.title: 两数之和
items.content_html:
题目链接：两数之和

题目详情：

class Solution {
public:
    vector<int> twoSum(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        unordered_map<int,int>temp;
        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++)
        {
            int num = nums[i];
            if(temp.find(target-num)!=temp.end())
                return {temp[target-num],i};
            else
                temp.insert({num,i});
        }
        return {};
    }
};
